title: Bunch of transaction error
text: Can’t seems to make any online order right

title: Juk
text: Purple interface after updating, cannot be changed.

title: Adi Turcu
text: Best app ever to sent and received money all over the wolrd.

title: Crooks
text: Not worth having an account with Revolut. My card constantly says chip error plus I have to pay $18 a month for my account . When I tried to close my account they want to charge me $30 to do so.  This company does not care about it's customers at all only getting money out of you.

title: Easy and efficient
text: Easy, efficient and even interesting

title: Disappointed Loyal Customer
text: I've been a satisfied Revolut user in Europe for nearly 4 years. However, my experience transitioning to the US has been a continuous loop of disappointment. Despite multiple attempts to verify my identity following their own staff's advice, I've been given the runaround, with multiple representatives providing inconsistent guidance. It's deeply frustrating and time-consuming to be asked repeatedly to close and reopen accounts, and even more annoying to be told to avoid providing necessary residency information to be able to have an account. Revolut, I expected more given my longstanding loyalty. It’s essential to respect your customers' time and offer consistent, transparent solutions. This has unfortunately tainted my once positive view of your service.

title: What is going on at Revolut?
text:
Up until now I have been a faithful user for five years. Now for some obscure reason my almost instant international payments ground to a halt. No one at Revolut can tell me why other than I have to wait out a five day timeline.

The problem with Revolut has always been there is no phone number and nobody to talk to. This is a sausage machine. 

Sadly, it’s time to move on. There are others out there doing it better just like Revolut used to

title: Awful for transferring money
text: Before I went to Europe, I made sure to ring up my America bank account with my Revolut card. Even though my bank account is linked to the Revolut card it still takes 3 to 5 days for a transfer of funds to go through and they never actually make them go through on the day. They say they would very very frustrating and very annoying

title: Terrible excuse for a “bank”
text:
You can’t use this bank to actually pay for anything. Want to send money through Apple Pay? Sorry, your cards been frozen. Need to pay your car loan? Sorry, your cards been frozen. Need to spend more than $10 anywhere? Sorry, your cards been frozen. 

And now they’re charging to transfer money into your account? What a sorry excuse for a “bank”. At least it will act as a decent savings account since you can’t actually use it to pay for anything.

title: Check out their Twitter, page of a bunch of bad reviews and experiences
text:
This company wrote a template response to my last review, and they still have not resolved any issues with holding my money. 

Before downloading this app, please be aware of this company and how they do business. This is not a bank.

title: Disappointed
text: Google search for Revolut Chat provided instructions. I followed those instructions but no Chat available on Revolut. I’m trying to track a transfer from USA acct to Revolut which never arrived to Revolt acct. don’t recommend this company. No way to reach customer service staff.

title: Not Clear
text: I added an amount using a debit card, as I have done many times and I’ve been charged a fee without it being made clear before I committed the payment. This app gets worse every time.

title: Terrible
text: Can’t withdraw money and close account. Regret ever signing up.

title: No better than thieves
text: While traveling my phone and wallet got taken from my vehicle while at a gas station. I promptly reported the situation and was completely denied! I provided all the details of the event and in the end they didn’t even hear me out. Avoid at all costs!! I’d rather bank with cash app before using Revolut again.

title: Can’t access my account
text: I enjoyed this banking system while I was traveling. I enjoyed it so much that I ordered a medal card. Now I recently changed my number and don’t have access to my account. You can’t speak to anyone at customer service and have repeatedly went thru there system to get a verification code to my email that I never received no matter how many times I submitted it. I’m just thankful that I did not send some of my direct deposit to this account or else I would’ve been screwed with no access. Just lost a customer. I wish I would’ve read the reviews before using it. Just terrible.

title: A godsend during my recent travel
text: Revolut was extremely helpful during my trip abroad. I travelled from the US to France and transferring money from my US bank account to Revolut then exchanging it to Euros was a breeze on the app. I like that I can go to the ATMs Revolut lists as being compatible with their cards and withdraw cash without ATM fees and pay Revolut less than $4 in service fees. It was, however, frustrating that I had to wait 24 hours to withdraw more money if I had already taken out more than $200. I recommend this for US-based travelers who only want cash when needed vs withdrawing a lot of foreign currency up-front just to not use all of it. I can’t speak for their actual banking nor their customer service, but as a casual user of the product, I would recommend.

title: Scammers
text: This app was started out good, but it ended with nothing but limits and questions on my personal business. They had nothing to do with my spending on the app. They continue to restrict my account and asked me personal questions over and over and over again asking for re-verification, after I’ve already verified five times horrible company. I don’t know what’s going on here but I believe they’re scamming people because they are wanting too much information that has nothing to do with what I have used the account for.

title: Scam
text: Go somewhere else. This company is a scam. There’s so many other better banks out that do it better. Most of their 5 star ratings aren’t legit.

title: Ease in transferring Fund Internationally
text: This was the first bank/app that made sending funds internationally easy for me without the need for tedious paper work at the bank branch.

title: A bank that prevents the use of personal funds
text:
They freeze your funds in your account whenever they want and for as long as they want, and they call it account verification and will never tell you what they are verifying, they only have secrets 
Very low fees and fast transfers, but in the end you risk more problems, the support service is disgusting, they answer everything with ready-made templates and do nothing.

title: Freshly updated asks for update
text:
I have just updated the app and now it won’t let me in at all 🤦‍♀️ keep showing a screen with “Your app is out of date”. And there is just one button “Update”. But since it’s just been updated it’s impossible to do… That’s a huge bug guys….

UPD Problem solved by myself via web interface and e-mail. So I’m changing from 1 star to 4.

title: Lacking basic functions
text: As popular as cash app is you would think it would work with this card. You can add money to cash app from Revolut but u cannot cash out ur cash app balance to your Revolut card which makes it very inconvenient and impossible to use in some situations

title: TERRIBLE APP
text: Abysmal customer service and holds on to your money, freezes your bank account, and will keep it all for a week. Do not use this app I couldn’t recommend it less.

title: Simply the Best
text: Revolut has become - by far - the best in online banking. And now they even offer a Pro account with unlimited cashback.

title: requires a selfie?!
text: my normal bank doesn't ask for this - it's a huge privacy violation. this startup is just a data harvester now

title: Efficient
text: Best bank so far

title: Students Beware - Federal Title IV Refund Held, No LIVE Customer Service
text: I’ve been waiting on my student refund and they’ve held it to the point my cell phone/internet service is off and I need the funds to turn it back on. They asked for sender’s website and I sent verification and screenshots in-app and no response several hours later and now it’s after business hours. “Title IV funds are federal student aid funds, which are from federal student aid programs administered by the U.S. Department of Education.” No one responded to my support email or feedback email either. When I called the toll free number, it’s automated, and when I pressed 0 to try for an operator, it hung up on me. There’s no human. No way you can hold people’s money without timely support during business hours. They don’t even respect government issues funds. I do not recommend. I completely regret trusting them. I did not read these reviews until today. The business app is just as bad. I reported issues with screenshots upon establishing my account and no response. They don’t care.

title: Additional feature
text: Would love to be able to give shares as gift to my child account!

title: Expat Loving Revolut
text: American expat living in Sweden with student loans back home. This service and app work perfectly for my situation. I receive my pay in Swedish Krona, convert to USD with no fees with my Premium membership, and then transfer what I need to my American account and it arrives same-day.  All for around $16 per month, Premium Fee is 94.99 SEK and international transfer fee comes out to around $9 per month.

title: Buggy
text:
So many little things go wrong with this app. The latest is the referral link that gets generated when I try to invite my friends to start using Revolut. The link takes anyone who I invite to create an account based in the UK. I’m based in the US and so are the people I am referring. 🙄

And the worst part is that when I try to access the Help section, there is absolutely nothing that will allow me to get help with what the problem actually is.  There is no way to communicate directly with anyone .  There are only rigid preset categories that are not accurate for the type of assistance I need. It’s as if the developers are so
cocky in their coding that they cannot even fathom a user having an issue with the system that is not listed by the developer already.

title: Worst Ever Card - Beware, here’s some truths!!!
text: I have a Revolute Card and have been using the service for almost a couple of years but after over 12 months of continuously having my account locked with restrictions and inabilities to transfer funds then to verify my identity and provide all my personally banking data, I’ve finally told them to go and take a running leap…. While it’s worked from time to time and proved convenient, overall this card has been nothing but an absolute headache since day one and a constant battle to maintain and keep active due to their over the top security protocols and staff that seem to all display lack of empathy and common sense to the users needs and loyalty.  The over reach for personal data is unbelievable and I would warn anyone considering Revolute to be prepared to lay out all your personal affairs to them in order to satisfy their databases. This was a mistake and I’m happily canceling this card if tyranny !! Good Riddance!

title: Poor customer service
text: I had a large transfer rejected and they wouldn’t do anything to help

title: Total scam! They have early termination fees!
text: It is outrageous that companies can steal money from people. Wise.com is completely free. Stay away from these scammers, once you deposit money, they will take everything in monthly fees, and you will not be able to cancel unless you pay a big penalty, and obviously, this information is well hidden (otherwise I would have never joined these scammers). Just go with Wise, I’ve been with them for many years and there is no monthly fee whatsoever (they used to be known as TransferWise).

title: Big pile of…
text: This was one of the most disappointing banking I’ve ever experienced!

title: Verification
text: Today I have been asked to verify where my funds originated. I gave them two documents and now getting text for more documents.  The person on text, Lucas, asked if I needed more information to understand why they were asking for my personal documents. Darn right I do!  But not with a condescending attitude

title: Do not Bank here. Worst ever
text: I would give you guys negative 5 stars if I could.This is the worst financial institution ever.They let somebody. Do an acount cake overAnd go and change all my login credentials after I lost my phone.I lost over $7000 because they were like money being transferred out of my other bank accounts.I was even a bank account that was open fraudulently used on here.I realize itWhen I went to check my accounts that I use for putting money awayThere was many fraudulent transactions from my accounts.I .go to contact them I can’t get through on chat support because my credentials were changed I couldn’t even pass ID verification. I wrote them emails with my contact information phone and the issues that were going on with my account.They failed to respond to me after a month and a half of trying I finally got in.To find somebody else’s address in my profile from Utah and the A locator was set to there.That’s on the other side of the country from where I live. they had removed a bunch of informationFrom my account before I got back in there. Nowthey want to sit there and deny every thingAnd said there was no signs of fraudelent activity.I have denied all my disputes.I’m gonna make sure I make an example out of them. Im gunna slap a big lawsuit on them.Everybody stay away from this bank Internet banking is not the same as everybody thinks. They will not offer u phone support. No matter what the situation isI’ve been promised it three times already and then every time when it comes time for them to call they fail to comply.I’m sorry for the long review everybody but I want everyone to know if you value your money and the safety of your accountGo to another bank stay away from here. Pass my story on so everybody else knows thisAnd the truth gets out about the scamming crooked bank

title: increere
text: surprinzator de buna aplicatia asta in tota lumea imclusiv in america

title: Expectations Crushed- They get you on the fine print
text:
After paying for the annual metal card plan, I was very optimistic that this was the card for me on my upcoming trip to Sicily and Greece. 
I should have known from the difficulties adding money to this account, that it was going to be difficult to get money out… and it was😖
But I kept telling myself because of the positive reviews that it would be ok. 
However; once abroad I quickly found out that there are unrealistic limitations on atm/euro withdrawals, and found myself scrambling for a way to get euro out to complete my trip. 

SO BE AWARE AND READ ALL FINE PRINT BEFORE CONSIDERING THIS FOR A TRIP. YOU WILL BE DISAPPOINTED!!!

title: Used to love it… not anymore
text: Since I’ve been using Revolut, they’ve raised the fees on the free version substantially and they don’t communicate it well before a transaction. So it’s never until after the transaction that I see how much the fees have increased. They used to charge 0.5% for spending money in a different currency and then they raised it to 1%. Now I also see they’re charging another 1% fee for using the card on the weekend - so a total of 2% imposed on the transaction. I’m lazy so will likely continue using Revolut, but I would absolutely switch apps if a better option presents itself.

title: Good!
text: Very useful! Works well! :)

title: I got scammed and they wouldn’t give me my money back!
text: This is my last resort. I was scammed into putting my money into Revolut then someone hacked into my account and authorized payments to a cryptocurrency site and Revolut did nothing. I told them the transactions were not made by me and that I never received an approval notification because the account was hacked into, and when I tried to dispute the charges all they said was “you approved them so there’s nothing we can do”! But the whole point was that I DIDNT approve the charges, it was a hacker!!!! Now I am left with absolutely no money to pay for my life, not sure what to do because Revolut was able to get a hacker in and approve the payments, and miss the entire point of my dispute!! Please Revolut, at this point I just need my money back! I need someone to speak to because the robots don’t seem to understand, and while it usually takes a few days to weeks to look into these things they rejected my request after a few hours! Please help me, I need it.

title: No invitation
text: I signed up for an account on the 28th of august and received an email with "we’ll contact you when your invitation is ready". It’s September 6th now. It’s been 10 days. I have sent emails and Facebook pms 3 days ago but haven’t gotten a reply. The only place to get help according to the website is through the in-app support chat. Funny enough you can’t access that unless you have access to an account. I am leaving to another country and was looking forward to using the services Revolut offers… but now by the time I ever get an invitation + the extra time to get a debit card sent, I might as well forget it.  Pretty disappointed. Mainly when friends who signed up at the same time got their invitation days after.

title: So where’s the money?
text:
I regularly send money to a friend in Europe.  I transfer dollars to my Revolut account and exchange them for Euros and then send.  Everything is quite fast but the process of moving the money from my bank to Revolut is very slow.  For example, this month I requested a transfer on the 1st of the month. Today is the 7th and the money has not yet arrived.   Last month there was a similar delay.  

With other services, such as Wise, the entire process of moving the money from my account to my friend’s takes only two to three days.  

I find it hard to believe this is the best Revolut can do.

title: Was Great They Robinhood’d themselves
text: Use to evangelize this app. Now transactions have become more and more expensive and on top of that they are forcing everyone to sell their crypto holdings in the US without even an option of moving them to another wallet. STAY away from this company with a giant pole between you stopping you from any temptation.

title: Love this app
text: Hands down best app I’ve ever downloaded!

title: Card didn't arrive
text: It is over a month since I ordered my first card and it has not arrived. I had to cancel it and order a replacement card. Double-checked my address and it is correct. If this second card attempt doesn't arrive in the next month I will be going on a planned vacation without it and will have to close my Revolut account and use an alternate way to exchange money.

title: Received payment in minutes
text: Fantastic way to tranfer money. I can’t believe it could be this fast.

title: Thief’s! Scammers! DON’T SIGN UP!!!
text:
My initial problem started when I signed up under someone’s link. I did ALL of the requirements yet myself and the referee had all sorts of issues to get the bonus!! I then referred 3 people and low and behold that was also a nightmare to have to prove once again ALL steps were completed before they would push the bonus through. At that time you could actually chat with someone but let me tell you right now they cut that all the way out. My last and current referral is yep you guessed it having issues with saying they have not done all of the requirements. We have tried for FOUR solid days to chat, you cannot not even request it, we’ve sent countless emails and have not heard back from a single soul at Revolut!!!
RUN RUN RUN unless you like a challenge and to be ripped off then in that case these are a perfect fit for ya!!

title: Not great service
text: I tried making an account and their third party system could not verify me dispute several attempt and contacting customer service via the chat which was of no help to me. They simply said to retry what I had already done. My information was all correct. Very disappointed as I was looking forward to using this service, if it works for you that is great! :)
